pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, October 15, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Employment, Workforce Development and Labour Patricia Hajdu, will participate in a roundtable with Canada’s Building Trades Unions.

Room 340-S
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.

Toronto, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a keynote address and participate in an armchair discussion with President of Fortune Alan Murray, at the Fortune Global Forum.

Ballroom, Ritz-Carlton Toronto Hotel
181 Wellington Street West

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for Fortune Global Forum accredited media. For accreditation, please contact: kristin.matzen@meredith.com
    • Media are asked to present themselves to the media filing room on the 4th floor no later than 1:30 p.m.
    • Livestream available: http://fortune.com/2018/09/28/global-forum-2018-livestream/

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chief Executive Officer of China and Co-Chief Executive Officer of Asia Pacific for Morgan Stanley Wei Sun Christianson.

Toronto Ministers’ Regional Office
150 King Street West, Pearl Street Entrance

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the end of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Revolution and co-founder of AOL Steve Case, and Chair of National Geographic and Chief Executive Officer of the Case Foundation Jean Case.

Toronto Ministers’ Regional Office
150 King Street West, Pearl Street Entrance

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chief Executive Officer of Cisco Systems Chuck Robbins.

Toronto Ministers’ Regional Office
150 King Street West, Pearl Street Entrance

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chief Executive Officer of SAP SE Bill McDermott.

Toronto Ministers’ Regional Office
150 King Street West, Pearl Street Entrance

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chief Executive Officer of The Rock Creek Group Afsaneh Beschloss.

Toronto Ministers’ Regional Office
150 King Street West, Pearl Street Entrance

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chief Executive Officer of Element AI Jean-François Gagné.

Toronto Ministers’ Regional Office
150 King Street West, Pearl Street Entrance

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Fortune Global Forum Reception and Dinner.

Closed to media
